title: Projects
sub_title: During my professional life, I have developed several projects with incredible experiences that have had a positive impact on people and their businesses. Here you can find several projects and libraries that I had the opportunity to contribute to, where navigation is possible for some of them. Some of these projects are still active, others have been discontinued and more are not listed here for contractual reasons.
end_list: You've reached the end of the list.

projects.title: Dove Research
projects.description: Website designed to inform project vacancies, centralize articles and works from the research group.

projects.title: Iguatemi
projects.description: Creation of the shopkeeper portal, the main tool used for sales metrics, service requests, and other services offered to the customers.

projects.title: Vittude
projects.description: Platform created to connect psychologists and patients, offering a secure system where consultations can be carried out.
